00078 typedef struct bNodeSocketTemplate {
00079     int type, limit;
00080     char name[64];  /* MAX_NAME */
00081     float val1, val2, val3, val4;   /* default alloc value for inputs */
00082     float min, max;
00083     PropertySubType subtype;
00084     int flag;
00085     
00086     /* after this line is used internal only */
00087     struct bNodeSocket *sock;       /* used to hold verified socket */
00088 } bNodeSocketTemplate;
